MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.06pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because there are further fault finding investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:15pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
